speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0073/2006 ) by Sophia in 't Veld, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on sectoral aspects of the State Aid Action Plan: aid for innovation ( 2006/2044(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0073/2006 ) by Sophia in 't Veld, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on sectoral aspects of the State Aid Action Plan: aid for innovation ( 2006/2044(INI) ).
